answers.answer: Because our bodys aren't use to this weight gain probably.

Depends on the amount of swelling... Gradual swelling Is normal... Usually because the baby is putting pressure on our veins and arteries which makes fluid settle in our feet. If its drastic swelling it can be a sign of preeclampsia.
